modName: Yumi Mitsushige - Heir of Gaiden Shinji - XPMSE and HDT Compatible
summary: A mysterious girl is present in the Drunken Huntsman, having traveled a long way. Despite her delicate features, she is not to be underestimated, for she is a descendant of the greatest swordsman of the First Era. Compatible with XPMSE and/or HDT.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#00ff00][size=3]THIS NOT-FOR PROFIT MOD CAN BE DOWNLOADED AND USED FREE OF CHARGE[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/34IpuVs.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][i]"The best techniques are passed on by the survivors"
[/i]Gaiden Shinji, 1E 947[/center]

So said the legendary swordsman, leader of the Order of the Diagna, founder and Blademaster of the Arena of Imperial City, and later sacrificed his own life in the Thirty-Year Siege of Orsinium. Indeed, [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:People_G]Gaiden Shinji[/url] sired children and taught them of his way and skills, intending such education to be passed down through generations of his bloodline. His heirs went on to serve the Empire, mostly as members of the elite Blades whose responsibility is the safety and defense of the Emperor, but others also founded the exclusive Gaiden Shinji school of swordmanship, where only the chosen were given the best education.

However, after the Oblivion Crisis the fortunes of the Empire began to waver, and so did the School; by the time the Thalmor assaulted Cyrodiil and virtually annihilated most of the Blades and sent a few hiding in difficult safety, the School was shuttered, its tenets scattered, students and teachers banished or condemned, save for one Kai Mitsushige, the last teacher of the School and practitioner of the Gaiden Shinji style, and his 16-year-old daughter Yumi, both who lived in near-obscurity in the squalid city of Bravil.

His wife died in childbirth, nevertheless Kai took upon himself to raise Yumi, and the girl displayed such precociousness at an early age, having mastered the sword-fighting basics by six, became an expert archer by nine, and then employed as a private spy and hunter by 12. Kai was convinced that in a few more years Yumi would be ready to face the world.

Unfortunately, at the time the Empire is at its weakest, its resources stretched too thin for which to maintain itself as a working government to enforce law and order, in Bravil violence erupted when two rival criminal gangs declared open war and wreaked havoc upon the city, and naturally this attracted the attention of the ever-domineering Thalmor, who thought that the ensuing chaos would bring out the Blades into the open, soft targets for their campaign of eradication.

With the Thalmor out and soon to get him, sure death awaiting, Kai had no choice but to send Yumi on her own, somewhere she could be not known to the Thalmor but would allow her freedom to pursue further education and possible employment.

[b]Features[/b]

[list][*]She's immune to most diseases.
[*]She'll use mostly UNP-compatible armor, clothing and accessories, but will also wear vanilla armor and jewelry.
[*]Compatible with all major follower management mods and Enhanced Character Edit installations.
[*][size=2]Of course, further backstory included in her personal journal.[/size]
[*][size=2][b]Swords and greatsword unique to Yumi. Can be tempered.[/b][/size]
[*][color=#ff00ff][size=2][b]Yumi can be found at the Drunken Huntsman, in Whiterun.[/b][/size][/color]
[*][color=#ff00ff][size=2][b]UNP/UNPCM versions currently available. CBBE versions to be uploaded later.[/b][/size][/color]
[/list][size=2]
[b]Installation[/b]

[list][*][size=2]Manual:[b] [/b]Open the mod archive then extract the contents into the Skyrim Data directory, before activating it on the load list.[/size]
[*][size=2]NMM: Install and activate the mod after downloading.[/size]
[*][size=2]Mod Organizer: Install the mod after downloading, and then activate.[/size]
[/list][/size]
[b]Removal[/b]

[list][*]Manual: dismiss Yumi (remove items if any from her inventory) make a hard save, exit the game, deactivate the mod and then delete YumiShige*.ESP and associated .BSA file.
[*]NMM: dismiss Yumi (remove items if any from her inventory), make a hard save, exit the game, deactivate and uninstall.
[*]Mod Organizer: dismiss Yumi (remove items beforehand), make a hard save, exit the game, deactivate and uninstall.
[/list]
[b]Upgrade[/b]

[list][*]Manual, NMM or MO: remove user items from her inventory, then dismiss Yumi, before making a hard save, exit the game, deactivate the mod, go back to the game, wait for one in-game hour, and then make another save, exit Skyrim, and then overwrite the mod with the new version.
[/list]
[b]Lore References to Gaiden Shinji[/b]
[list][*][size=2][url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:People_G]UESP[/url][/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.imperial-library.info/content/gaiden-shinji]The Imperial Library[/url][/size]
[/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b]

[list][*]iAFT -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71689
[*]My Home is Your Home -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045
[*]EFF (preferred, currently in use) -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933
[*]Follower Commentary Overhaul -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019
[*]Insanity's Sorrow Celtic Katana -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15389/?
[*]GIM Boots -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55611
[*]Kisetsu Kimono for UNP (as shown) -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58333
[*]Wa Ribbon -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55524
[*]Blades Samurai Armor and Kimonos (as shown) -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24704
[*]Female Blades Light Armor for UNP -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55460
[*]Blades Hakama -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39718
[*]Leather Backpack -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13732
[*]Plush Backpack -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17539
[*]Lore Weapon Expansion -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44179
[*]Scoped Bows -- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/
[/list]
[b]Credits and Thanks[/b]

I would like to thank the following people and fellow modders for inspiration, for their technical expertise, and making this mod possible: Kalilies, Bronze316, Gamwich, MissJennaBee, YuiH, Tamira, TMPhoenix, tktk, InsanitySorrow, anano, volvaga0, Chesko, mannyGT, OutLaw666, Natilde, the generous archivists at UESP.net and the Imperial Library, and to others I shall not mention.

Also props to Skyrimaguas, undisputed Skyrim modding genius.

I would also thank the aforementioned modders in the resources section for their work.

Finally, I thank Corri English and [url=http://www38.atwiki.jp/tes5/pages/244.html]Ao Takahashi[/url] for providing a nice voice to Ysolda and Elisif (among others, FemaleYoungEager voice type).

[b]Permissions[/b]

This mod (or its assets) cannot be uploaded to sites other than Nexus or TESA, or modified in any form without my express permission.
author: sa547

files.fileName: Yumi Mitsushige - Heir of Gaiden Shinji - CBBE-59717-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Uploaded both UNP and CBBE versions.
Fixed skill tree so that dual flurry can be used at earlier levels.
Now used lossless textures to eliminate blocky look.

files.name: Yumi Mitsushige REMIXED EDITION UNP
files.changelogHtml:
Reworked facial features plus new hairstyle from KS Hairdos Renewal
Added two-handed greatsword skills
Added new personalized Akaviri sword and greatsword
No more eyeshine!
